author: Matt Oates
description: Bioinformatics modules written specifically for Perl6. This is not BioPerl, for something that has a more compatible API checkout the module 'bioperl6' maintained by Chris Fields. These modules are biased towards working with amino acid sequences at the moment. Of general use is a non-blocking and concurrent FASTA parser for working with Perl6 Promises.
name: BioInfo
